Documentation

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Navbar

A purely css, responsive navbar
boba
  • Category
  • Category
  • Category 
<nav class="navbar">
    <a href=# class="logo">boba</a>
    <input class="menu-btn" type="checkbox" id="example-nav" />
    <label class="menu-icon" for="example-nav"><span class="navicon"></span></label>
    <ul class="right-menu">
        <li>
            <a href=#><span>Category</span></a>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a href=#><span>Category</span></a>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a href=#><span>Category</span></a>
        </li>
    </ul>
</nav>

Sticky

Add the .sticky class to the navbar to make it stick to the top of the page.
<nav class="navbar sticky">
    <a href=# class="logo">boba</a>
    <input class="menu-btn" type="checkbox" id="sticky-nav" />
    <label class="menu-icon" for="sticky-nav"><span class="navicon"></span></label>
    <ul class="right-menu">
        <li>
            <a href=#><span>Category</span></a>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a href=#><span>Category</span></a>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a href=#><span>Category</span></a>
        </li>
    </ul>
</nav>

Alignment

Nav menu items can be justified to the left by replacing .right-menu with .left-menu
boba
  • Category
  • Category
  • Category 
<nav class="navbar">
    <a href=# class="logo">boba</a>
    <input class="menu-btn" type="checkbox" id="justify-nav" />
    <label class="menu-icon" for="justify-nav"><span class="navicon"></span></label>
    <ul class="left-menu">
        <li>
            <a href=#><span>Category</span></a>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a href=#><span>Category</span></a>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a href=#><span>Category</span></a>
        </li>
    </ul>
</nav>

    <a href=# class="logo">boba</a>

    <label class="menu-icon" for="green-nav"><span class="navicon"></span></label>
    <ul class="right-menu">
        <li>
            <a href=#><span>Category</span></a>
